credit_line: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
title: Tapestry Design with Mirror Images of Trude Guermonprez and John Elsesser
description: Repeating profiles of Trude Guermonprez and John Elsesser, facing left and facing right.  Red, orange, red, and blue crayon is applied in individual strokes to areas of paper between the profiles.  Based on 1993-121-103 or 104.
name: Drawing
